hackathon-description-text: HackNC is entirely student-run. This will be our 5th incredible hackathon since we began in 2014. We're known for providing amazing food and having lots of fun!
hackathon-eligibility: You must be 18 or older (unless you are a UNC-CH student) to attend. There is no strict team size limit but be aware that most prizes will be given out in sets of 4.
hackathon-rules:
We follow the MLH code of conduct found 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: One GoPro HERO Session per team member
One Amazon Echo Dot per team member
One Mini Quadcopter per team member
One $250 Amazon gift card per team member
One Amazon Echo Dot per team member
One $50 Amazon gift card per team member
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Sentry One's Best Use of the Microsoft Stack

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Team that has the best domain registered on domain.com will each get a raspberry pi kit.
The team that has the best use of Amazon Web Services will each get $250 in AWS credit.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web services

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Woollen Gymnasium, Chapel Hill, NC 27514, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: We like to see ideas that are new and unique

hackathon-location-address: Woollen Gymnasium, Chapel Hill, NC 27514, USA
hackathon-description-header: Let's go on an adventure! Build, craft, and code to your heart's content!
hackathon-location-description: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill - Woollen Gym
